document.full_text: the texas rangers hammered baltimore 13-1 in the second game of a double-header on saturday, starting pitcher matt harrison retiring the final 21 orioles batters he faced.
document.title: ruthless rangers rout orioles 13-1
lines_and_colors: the texas rangers hammered baltimore 13-1 in the second game of a double-header on saturday, starting pitcher matt harrison retiring the final 21 orioles batters he faced.
